Migration.Name: Drop AD_Column_AD_MigrationData constraint
Migration.Comments: Migrations can't be loaded if they both create a column and reference it. The constraint is unnecessary for this table.

Step.SQLStatement: ALTER TABLE adempiere.ad_migrationdata DROP CONSTRAINT adcolumn_admigrationdata;
Step.RollbackStatement: ALTER TABLE adempiere.ad_migrationdata ADD CONSTRAINT adcolumn_admigrationdata FOREIGN KEY (ad_column_id) REFERENCES adempiere.ad_column (ad_column_id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED;
